longInfo:
Passport required.
- Nationals of France are allowed to enter with expired (max.
  5 years) passports.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of any passport replacing document accepted by
  France or Spain, which must be transited to reach Andorra.

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Mayotte will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State
